page.title: 18Life Styles
page.content: The people in this block have comfortable life styles. Most own their own cars and about half their own house or flat. Denim jeans seem to be the most popular wear by men and women for casual occasions, with large floppy blouses or shirts. For formal parties or dinners pretty blouses and long skirts seem to be the norm for girls. The younger generation have plenty of discos and dances to enjoy, a local hotel has concerts by various groups throughout the year. There is only one betting shop in Dawlish, mostly to do with horse racing. Card bingo is played in several clubs.
